name: Flight Rising: Full-size Previews
description:
Resizes the gene, breed change and skin preview window to show the dragon at full-size (350px)

Recommended for big screens only
additional_info:
FIXED renaming being off-limits
FIXED the image resizing affecting element icon on the AH
Fixed some other things
